names.commonEnglish: Six-Gentlemen of Metal and Water Decoction
aka: Dang Gui, Rehmannia and Six Herbs Combination

actions: Dries Dampness, transforms Phlegm, descends Rebellious Qi and stops vomiting.
With Fu Ling, expels Phlegm and stops nausea and vomiting, hiccups, coughs with clear, profuse Phlegm and loose and watery stools.
Regulates Qi, adjusts the Middle, relieves the diaphragm, dries Dampness and transforms Phlegm.
With Sheng Jiang, for vomiting due to Dis-harmony of the Stomach Qi.
With Zhi Ban Xia, for a stifling sensation in the chest and cough with excessive white, viscous sputum due to Phlegm-Damp Obstruction.
With Zhi Ban Xia and Fu Ling, for cough due to accumulation of Dampness and Phlegm.
Promotes urination, leaches out Dampness, strengthens the Spleen and transforms Phlegm.
With Zhi Ban Xia, Chen Pi and Sheng Jiang, for congested fluids in the Stomach causing nausea and vomiting.
Tonifies the Spleen, augments Qi, moistens the Lungs, resolves Phlegm, stops cough and moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs.
Tonifies, invigorates and harmonizes the Blood, disperses Cold, stops cough and treats dyspnea.
With Shu Di Huang, for Heat symptoms due to Yin Deficiency and Devastated Blood.
With Chen Pi, Zhi Ban Xia, Fu Ling and Gan Cao, for coughing during the night, dyspnea and profuse and salty-tasting sputum due to Kidney and Lung Yin Deficiency.
Nourishes Liver and Kidney Yin and arrests cough and wheezing.
With Chen Pi, Zhi Ban Xia, Fu Ling, Dang Gui and Gan Cao, for cough, wheezing and sputum due to Kidney Deficiency.
Releases the Exterior, induces perspiration. disperses Cold, warms the Middle, stops vomiting, warms the Lungs, stops cough and reduces the toxicity of other herbs.
With Zhi Ban Xia, for vomiting due to many causes including Stomach Cold and productive cough due to Phlegm-Dampness.
Enriches and moistens the Lungs and Kidneys
Regulates and promotes Qi
Dispels Dampness
Harmonizes the Middle Jiao
Transforms Phlegm
syndromes: Damp-Phlegm due to Lung and Kidney Yin Deficiency

symptoms: Sputum may have a salty taste
Stifling sensation in the chest and diaphragm
manifestations.tongueCoat: Peeled or Thick and white or Chipped-Whitish
manifestations.pulse: Thready and rapid or Slippery or Fine, slippery and empty

modifications.purpose: the relief stage of asthma due to Spleen Qi Deficiency with Lung Qi and Yin Deficiency
